tutorial.speak:
To see where you have been requested to volunteer and to confirm or decline, click on "Plans".
The "Serving Times" section has a list of upcoming roles you have been requested for.
Click on a role to see the details and confirm or decline the request.
Here you can see the details about what the time commitments are. A notes section with any additional details.
You can also see who else you will be serving with on the right side of the screen.
Click the Accept or Decline button to confirm or decline the request.
Back on the Plans page, you can see all upcoming serving dates and a list of blockout dates you have set.
If you would like to set a new blockout date for a vacation or other reasons, click the Add icon.
Set the start and end date you wish to block out and click "Save".
The scheduler will see the blockout dates and will not be able to schedule you during those times.
